mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES (SEQ_BONO.NEXTVAL, 3, #{boardCateg}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, DEFAULT, #{memberNo}, SYSDATE, 1, NULL, DEFAULT, 'N', NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT B.*, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, ROWNUM FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO=#{boardNo} AND B.BOARD_STATUS='Y'
